rules.content: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
"'Authority' is our mission, 'Shaping Tomorrow with AI Today' is our vision" - any Xebian

tags.setting: A wizard in goggles and a singed lab coat stands amid a cluttered workshop, adjusting a sparking contraption while blueprints float magically around them.
